CreateIncrementalMigrationStrategy.document: Create an incremental migration strategy for the storage of the professional application.
CreateIncrementalMigrationStrategy.name: CreateIncrementalMigrationStrategy

CreateStorage.document:
This API is used to create storage for professional applications.

Note:
- This API is exclusively for professional applications.
- When a customer creates a VOD professional application, the system automatically enables storage in certain regions by default. If the customer needs to enable storage in other regions, they can do so using this API.
- All storage regions and the regions where storage have already been enabled can be queried using the [DescribeStorageRegions](https://cloud.tencent.com/document/product/266/72480) API.
CreateStorage.name: CreateProSubAppStorage

CreateStorageCredentials.document: The API is used to generate access credentials for VOD professional applications, such as generating credentials for client uploads.
CreateStorageCredentials.name: Create credentials for the storage of VOD application

DescribeIncrementalMigrationStrategyInfo.document: Describe the information of the incremental migration strategy.
DescribeIncrementalMigrationStrategyInfo.name: DescribeIncrementalMigrationStrategyInfos

DescribeStorage.document:
This API is used to query bucket information in the professional application, and it also supports paginated queries.
Note:
- This API is exclusively for use in the professional application.
DescribeStorage.name: DescribeStorage

ModifyIncrementalMigrationStrategy.document: Modify the information of incremental migration strategy.
ModifyIncrementalMigrationStrategy.name: ModifyIncrementalMigrationStrategy

members.document: The ID of [VOD Professional Application](http://tencentcloud.com/document/product/266/67977).
members.name: SubAppId

members.document: The bucket ID where the strategy takes effect.
members.name: BucketId

members.document: Incremental migration strategy name. The name length should not exceed 100 characters. Allowed characters include: Chinese characters, English characters, `0-9`,` _` and ` -`.
members.name: StrategyName

members.document:
Source type. Valid values:
  • HTTP: the source type is HTTP.
members.name: OriginType

members.document: Incremental migration HTTP origin source configuration. This field is required when the OriginType value is `HTTP`.
members.name: HttpOriginConfig

members.document: The ID of the incremental migration strategy.
members.name: StrategyId

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: The ID of [VOD Professional Application](http://tencentcloud.com/document/product/266/67977).
members.name: SubAppId

members.document:
The policy string serialized by URL Encode is used as the input parameter Policy. The server will URL Decode the Policy value and grant temporary access credentials according to the parsed policy. Please pass in parameters according to the specification. Note: 1.The policy syntax refers to [Cloud Access Management](/document/product/598/10603). 2.The policy cannot contain the principal element. 3.The policy actions include:
  • name/vod:ListObjects;
  • name/vod:ListObjectsV2;
  • name/vod:HeadObject;
  • name/vod:PutObject;
  • name/vod:ListParts;
  • name/vod:PostObject;
  • name/vod:CreateMultipartUpload;
  • name/vod:UploadPart;
  • name/vod:CompleteMultipartUpload;
  • name/vod:AbortMultipartUpload;
  • name/vod:ListMultipartUploads;
  • name/vod:CopyObject;
  • name/vod:RestoreObject;
  • name/vod:DeleteObjects;
  • name/vod:DeleteObject;
  • name/vod:UploadPartCopy.
    • 4.The resource format of the policy is `qcs::vod:[region]:uid/[AppID]:prefix//[SubAppId]/[BucketId]/[Path]`, where AppID, SubAppId, BucketId and Path need to be filled in as required.
members.name: Policy

members.document: Specifies the validity period of credentials in seconds. The default value is 1800 seconds and the maximum value is 129600 seconds.
members.name: DurationSeconds

members.document: Credentials.
members.name: Credentials

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: The ID of [VOD Professional Application](http://tencentcloud.com/document/product/266/67977).
members.name: SubAppId

members.document: Storage region, which must be a region supported by the system. All storage regions and the regions where storage buckets have already been enabled can be queried using the [DescribeStorageRegions](https://www.tencentcloud.com/document/product/266/46542) API.
members.name: StorageRegion

members.document:
The name of the storage.
  • Only lowercase English letters, numbers, hyphens "-", and their combinations are supported.
  • The storage name cannot start or end with a "-".
  • The maximum length of the storage name is 64 characters.
members.name: StorageName

members.document: The unique identifier ID of the storage bucket.
members.name: BucketId

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Access Key ID.
members.name: AccessKeyId

members.document: Secret Access Key.
members.name: SecretAccessKey

members.document: The session token length depends on the binding policy and is no longer than 4096 bytes.
members.name: SessionToken

members.document: The expiration time of the credentials.
members.name: Expiration

members.document: The ID of [VOD Professional Application](http://tencentcloud.com/document/product/266/67977).
members.name: SubAppId

members.document: The bucket ID where the strategy takes effect.
members.name: BucketId

members.document: The ID of the incremental migration strategy.
members.name: StrategyId

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: The ID of [VOD Professional Application](http://tencentcloud.com/document/product/266/67977).
members.name: SubAppId

members.document:
Filter criteria. The maximum number of Filters.Values is `20`. If this parameter is not input, all stategy information under the current SubAppId will be returned. The detailed filter criteria are as follows:
  • BucketId: Filter by the ID of bucket;
  • StrategyId: Filter by the ID of strategy.
members.name: Filters

members.document:
Sort the returned results according to this field. SortBy.Field Values include:
  • UpdateTime: (Default) Update time of the strategy.
    • SortBy.Order Values include:
  • Desc: (Default) The order is descend.
members.name: SortBy

members.document: Offset for paginated queries. Default value: `0`.
members.name: Offset

members.document: Limit on paginated queries. Default value: `20`. Maximum value: `100`.
members.name: Limit

members.document: Total count of matched strategies.
members.name: TotalCount

members.document: Information of all matched strategies.
members.name: StrategyInfoSet

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: The ID of [VOD Professional Application](http://tencentcloud.com/document/product/266/67977).
members.name: SubAppId

members.document:
Filter criteria. The maximum number of Filters.Values is `20`. If this parameter is not input, all storage under the current SubAppId will be returned. The detailed filter criteria are as follows:
  • BucketId: Filter by the ID of bucket;
  • StorageName: Filter by the name of storage.
members.name: Filters

members.document:
Sort the returned results according to this field. SortBy.Field Values include:
  • UpdateTime: (Default) Create time of the storage.
    • SortBy.Order Values include:
  • Asc: (Default) The order is ascend.
members.name: SortBy

members.document: Offset for paginated queries. Default value: `0`.
members.name: Offset

members.document: Limit on paginated queries. Default value: `20`. Maximum value: `1000`.
members.name: Limit

members.document: Total count of matched storage.
members.name: TotalCount

members.document: Information of all matched storage.
members.name: StorageInfoSet

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

Filter.document:
Key-value pair filters for conditional filtering queries, such as filtering ID, name, and status.
If more than one filter exists, the logical relationship between these filters is `AND`.
If multiple values exist in one filter, the logical relationship between these values under the same filter is `OR`.

members.document: Fields to be filtered.
members.name: Name

members.document: Value of the filtered field.
members.name: Values

members.document: Address information, supporting domain names or IP addresses.
members.name: Endpoint

members.document: Backup address information.
members.name: StandbyEndpointSet

members.document: Header Key.
members.name: Key

members.document: Header Value.
members.name: Value

IncrementalMigrationHttpHeaderInfo.document: Incremental migration back-to-origin HTTP Header information.

members.document:
HTTP Header Passthrough Mode. Values valid:
<li>FOLLOW_ALL: Pass through all header information;<\li>
<li>FOLLOW_PART: Pass through partial header information;<\li>
<li>IGNORE_PART: Ignore partial header information.<\li>
members.name: HeaderFollowMode

members.document: Header Key Set for Passthrough. This field is required only when the HeaderFollowMode is set to `FOLLOW_PART`.
members.name: FollowHttpHeaderKeySet

members.document: Add Header Key-Value Pair Collection.
members.name: NewHttpHeaderSet

members.document: HTTP code to trigger back-to-source conditions. If not filled, the default value is `404`.
members.name: HttpStatusCode

members.document: Object key prefix to trigger back-to-source conditions
members.name: Prefix

IncrementalMigrationHttpOriginConfig.document: Configuration of the origin for incremental migration back-to-source.

members.document: Origin information for back-to-source.
members.name: OriginInfo

members.document: Back-to-source parameters.
members.name: OriginParameter

members.document:
Back-to-source mode. Valid values:
  • SYNC: Synchronous back-to-source;
  • ASYNC: Asynchronous back-to-source.
members.name: Mode

members.document: Back-to-source conditions.
members.name: OriginCondition

members.document: Incremental migration source address information.
members.name: EndpointInfo

members.document: Incremental migration source file information.
members.name: FileInfo

members.document: HTTP header passthrough information.
members.name: HttpHeaderInfo

members.document:
Back-to-source protocol. Valid values:
  • HTTP: Force HTTP;
  • HTTPS: Force HTTPS;
  • FOLLOW: Follow the request protocol.
members.name: Protocol

members.document:
Query string passthrough mode. Valid values
  • FOLLOW: Fully passthrough;
  • IGNORE: No passthrough at all.
members.name: QueryStringFollowMode

members.document: HTTP Code for redirection. Currently, only `301`, `302`, and `307` are supported. The default value is `302`.
members.name: HttpRedirectCode

members.document:
Origin server redirection follow mode. Valid values:
  • FOLLOW: Follow origin server redirection;
  • IGNORE: Ignore origin server redirection.
members.name: OriginRedirectionFollowMode

IncrementalMigrationOriginFileInfo.document: Incremental migration of origin file information.

members.document: File prefix configuration.
members.name: PrefixConfig

members.document: File 	suffix configuration.
members.name: SuffixConfig

members.document: Fixed file configuration.
members.name: FixedFileConfig

IncrementalMigrationOriginFixedFileConfi.document: Incremental migration of origin fixed file path configuration.

members.document: Fixed file path: If you fill in `example/test.png`, the origin-pull address will be: `http(s)://<origin domain>/example/test.png`.
members.name: FixedFilePath

IncrementalMigrationOriginPrefixConfig.document: Incremental migration of origin address prefix configuration.

members.document: Origin address prefix: If you fill in `test/`, the origin-pull address will be `http(s)://<origin domain>/test/<file name>`.
members.name: Prefix

IncrementalMigrationOriginSuffixConfig.document: Incremental migration of origin file suffix configuration.

members.document:
File suffix.
if filled with `.ts`, the origin-pull address will be: `http(s)://<origin domain>/<file name>.ts`.
members.name: Suffix

StorageInfo.document: Storage information for the professional application.

members.document: The ID of bucket.
members.name: BucketId

members.document: The name of bucket.
members.name: StorageName

members.document: The region of storage.
members.name: StorageRegion

members.document:
The status of the internet access domain name is stored. Valid values:
  • ONLINE: Active;
  • DEPLOYING: In deployment.
members.name: InternetAccessDomainStatus

members.document: The internet access domain name of storage.
members.name: InternetAccessDomain

members.document: The creation time of the storage.
